choices: Send Troops to clear the front door.
Climb the dish and continue the patrol with only pistols. Leaving the rifles.
Blow a hole in the roof with the transport.
1.content:
Marine Sgt Isabelle Contreras jogged off the rear ramp of the transport onto the red dust of the acapodian desert. She looked around. For miles all that could be seen was the rolling sand dunes and jagged pinicales of sand and rock. All except in one direction. Rising up out of the land. Like a plate in a sandpit. Was a huge satellite dish, constantly scanning the planets surface for signs of life. As Charlotte and her squad patrolled closer. They acessed how to gain entry. As far as she could see. There were three possible ways in.

The Front door, barred with sand after too many dust storms without being cleared, was probably still accessible once the sand was dug through. But it may take hours.

There was also a ladder to the top of the dish, where there would probably be an access hatch, however, once inside, the way down from the hatch would be small. Too small to take their rifles. They would have to use only pistols.

The Last way in was to have the transport blow in the roof of the structure, however, this method, if calculated wrongly, could destroy the computers full of data inside and vaporise any survivors.

Isabelle brought her radio to her lips, prepared to give the command to her squad. What should she order though?
1.title: TouchDown

12.content:
She pushed the button on her radio and it crackled into life. "Squad, we are going in through the dish, leave your rifles in the transport and grab your sidearms."

Minutes later the squad was assembled at the top of the dish, disheartened Sgt Contreras turned to the them. "Ok Marines, we have a problem, the hatch is too small for most of you to fit, so i want only the four smallest people we have apart from me." Four small desert camouflaged figures stepped forward. All Female, as all the men were either too tall or too buff to squeeze through the tiny gap.

Pvt Olivia Martinez: Latin American, 5'3'', Shapely Natural Latino Curves, D Cup Breasts, Long Auburn Hair, 21 Years Old.

Pvt Lei Zhu: Asian, 5'1'', B Cup Breasts, Shoulder Length Black Hair, 19 Years Old

Cpl Felicia Daniels: African-American, 5'6'', D Cup Breasts, Long Flowing Black Hair, 24 Years Old

Pvt Rachel Meyers: Caucasian, 5'4'', C Cup Breasts, Blonde Hair, 18 Years Old (Additional Note- Barely Passed the Basic IQ Test to gain entry, some say that the examiner took a "bribe" in order for her to scrape by.)

"Ok, I'm giving you all a choice." Sgt Contreras Started. "If Any of you do not want to do this, then i can send for reinforcements from base, but it will hinder all possible promotion choices for you."
12.title: Climb the dish and continue the patrol with onl...

choices: Pregnant females stucked to the ceiling.
122.content:
As all four of them saluted signaling they accept,Private Lei Zhu climbed in first.

"The power's out,torches."said Lei Zhu.

They all switched on their torches.

"Alright Lei Zhu and Martinez get the power back on while me and Rachel go around looking for survivors."ordered Felicia.

Lei Zhu and Martinez head off towards the darkness.They soon found a generator room.

"The main generator is wrecked."said Martinez.

"I think I've found the backup generator."Lei Zhu called out.

She turns it on and the power flickers back on.

As they looked to the ceiling they were shock to see...
122.title: Pvt Lei Zhu

choices: The females started to give birth.
Aliens started coming out of the air vents.
1221.content:
"Oh...my...god." whispered Martinez.

"We need to help them! "Lei screamed.

The two marines looked around the ceiling, 10 heavily pregnant females, some dressed in the uniform of the marines, others in the lab coats of scientists, lay suspended from the ceiling in what seemed to be a sort of purple mucus .The two marines decided to find a way to get them down.

"How in the world are we going to get up there and get them down?" asked Martinez.

"I don't know but we have to at least try!" said Lei, frantically .

As she said that...
1221.title: Pregnant females stuck to the ceiling.

choices: Lei stays put and waits for martinez to reopen the blast door.
Lei treads deeper inside the facility.
12212.content:
A sudden hissing noise was heard by the marines coming from up above the air vents. The squad prepares to intercept the things responsible for impregnating the women.

Soon enough, the aliens appeared up above them. Despite their tenacity, the prepared squad managed to fight off the creatures.

"Damn, to think there were too many of them already.", said Martinez.

"If we don't get out of here soon, we'll share the same fate like the ones had in this place.", said a worried Lei.

"All right. Lei, scout the hallway up ahead to see any signs of them incoming. The rest of you get these women out of those purple mucus things".

"Roger", she said as she opens the blast door leading to the hallway. However, once she walked a small distance, the door shuts itself off, separating Lei from the others.

"Damn, this stupid door won't open!" an angry Martinez said as she tries to get the controls working.

"Don't worry about me maybe there's another way back there through this hallway," Lei said.

"Don't be reckless! You don't know how many of those things are still out there!"
12212.title: Aliens started coming out of the air vents.

choices: Rachel encounters a heavily pregnant woman crying out for help...
The noise was the power coming back on...
Rachel is attacked by an Alien!
124.content:
The four women each gave a sharp salute to signal their agreement. Private Martinez and Private Daniels grabbed the access hatch and pulled it open, revealing a very narrow, very dark environment within the base. Cold air escaped from the hatch, briefly cooling down the women gathered under the hot sun.

Private Rachel Meyers stared down into the darkness, still confused about the nature of their mission here. She wasn't one to ask questions, and, in fact, the marines were frequently discouraged from doing so, but something about this base made her feel uneasy. At least it would be cool indoors, the hot sun was making her irritable - when her parents had forced her to sign up for the marine core, she had hoped to travel to more exotic locations than this barren desert. Her uniform chafed and she could feel herself starting to sweat.

"Okay, let's get inside," Sgt Contreras ordered.

The women climbed inside, carefully descending the ladder into the pitch black of the base. Rachel was the last to descend, and while it felt good to get inside, the darkness made her nervous.

"Looks like the power is out," Private Zhu said. "Torches."

When everyone had safely reached the floor, they activated their torches, shining some light on their surroundings. They were inside a metallic room, with large steel doors - only one of which was open.

"Zhu, Martinez; try and get the power back online," Felicia ordered. "They must have a backup generator here somewhere."

"Yes sir." Zhu said as she and Martinez passed through the open door and disappeared into the darkness.

"Meyers, me and you will split up - you search the south of the base, I'll search the north. Keep your radio on, I don't want any surprises," the Corporal said.

"Right," Rachel replied, heading down the corridor.

Rachel took the safety off her pistol and kept her weapon close by as she walked down the southern tunnel. Martinez and Zhu were long gone, probably working their magic with the computers in the control room. Technology had never been Rachel's strong suit, she wasn't as smart as the other women in the group, but she was okay with that - her determination had been all she needed to see her through military academy. Well...that and her good looks. Even in this environment, her long blonde hair was shampooed, conditioned and styled to perfection, while her uniform had been specially chosen to accentuate her slim, toned figure and perky, full breasts. To say Rachel was proud of her body would have been an understatement.

As she turned a corner - her torch eliminating the path ahead - she heard something move in the darkness. She froze, pointing her weapon ahead and scanning the area for signs of life...
124.title: Pvt Rachel Meyers

choices: The radio doesn't work, Rachel decides to stay with Kim...
Rachel gets a call from Martinez, she needs backup! (Leave Kim for now)
1241.content:
"Hellllllllp meeeee..."

Rachel heard a female voice moan from the shadows. Keeping her pistol ready, she moved ahead, scanning the room for signs of the moaning woman. "Who's there? What's wrong?" She asked.

"Over here..." The woman's voice called again.

Rachel was more than a little creeped out, but she kept her hands steady. The voice was coming from behind a stacked pile of metal crates, used for transporting cargo and the like, and they seemed to have been arranged into a sort of makeshift fort, not unlike one a child might make while they were playing.

"Are you okay?" Rachel asked again as she shone her light behind the crates.

She got her answer almost immediately. This woman was clearly not okay. She couldn't have been more than a few years older than Rachel, but she looked tired, dirty and absolutely terrified. She was completely naked, and some tattered scraps of clothing were littered on the floor beside her. Most worrying of all was the state of her body - while her arms and legs were long and slender, her stomach was absolutely enormous. The woman was clearly pregnant, but she was carrying more babies than Rachel would have ever thought humanly possible! Her massive ball shaped belly seemed to have pinned her to the floor, and it rested between her open legs, pinning her to the ground. Her breasts were equally gigantic, twice the size of the poor woman's head, and leaking milk all over her distended belly. The floor was covered in the stuff.

"Oh my God...what happened...are you...pregnant?"

"Of course I'm pregnant!" The woman snapped before letting out a loud moan as she rubbed her massive stomach. "You have to help me...get me out of here."

"I've never seen anything like this," Rachel said in amazement, shining her torch on the enormous ball shaped belly before her. It was strangely smooth and free of stretch marks. "How did this happen?"

"This base isn't safe," the woman said, clasping her hands over her nipples as they began to leak milk at a faster rate. "Urghhh..."

"What's wrong?" Rachel asked.

"This hasn't stopped all day..." the woman replied, milk leaking through her fingers as she struggled to contain her swollen breasts.

"Who did this to you?" Rachel asked again.

"There's an infestation...these creatures. We thought we had them contained but they broke free...all they want to do is breed..." she gestured to her monstrous belly. "I don't know if the others made it. But I managed to seal the doors and hide away here."

"Jesus..." Rachel shook her head. "What are these things?!"

"They're stronger and faster than anything you've seen before," the woman said.

"And they're...inside you?" Rachel was horrified. Whatever was growing inside this woman, it looked ready to tear her fragile body apart.

The woman hung her head, staring down at her fecundity. "Lots of them...and I was one of the lucky ones."

"What's your name?" Rachel asked.

"Kim," the woman replied, managing a slight smile as droplets of milk ran down her stomach.

"I better warn the others..." Rachel said, grabbing her radio. "Don't worry, we'll get out of here."
1241.title: First Encounter

choices: Leave Martinez and try to stop Zhu being dragged into the vent.
Ignore Zhu and try to find out what is wrong with Martinez.
12412.content:
Just as Rachel brought the radio to her lips it crackled into life. Pvt Martinez's voice reverberated around the cold metal walls.
"Sarge? Corporal? Anyone!? she cried, pleadingly.

Rachel squeezed at the button on her radio "Martinez? Its Meyers. Whats wrong?
"Oh Jesus Rachel, Please! Help us. Their all around us! Help us!" Suddenly the radio chatter was filled was the sounds of screaming and gunshots.

"Martinez? Zhu!? Olivia! Lei! " Teary-eyed Rachel turned to Kim, their wide eyes met under the dull lights of the station. "Kim, i'm sorry..... I've got to go.....they need me."
A Lazy Smile crawled onto Kim's lips. "Go" she said drowsily, "It's too late for me, but you might still save them if you hurry."

With that Rachel got up slowly, her legs weak from shock, she started to back away from Kim, trying to memorize the features of the woman's face. In case it was the last face she saw. Switching on the tracker she had at her wrist she turned and started to run, her vision blurred by tears, hazes of large objects rushed past her, seeming like memories more than things. She stopped and glanced at the tracker. Each team member was highlighted on an outline of the base, most were outside, only the four chosen were inside, she could see Zhu and Martinez in the Control room for the dish, they were both in a corner, obviously fighting for their lives.

She set a marker on the Control room and started to sprint once again through the small, dark metal corridors. Her breath coming in small, shallow huffs, a tear rolling down her cheek.Then as she turned a corner, she ran slap-bang into a heavy blast door, welded into the door, in dark block letters, were the words "Control Room".To the left was a panel in the shape of a human hand. She quickly slapped it with one had while aiming her sidearm with the other.

The Heavy Steel door grinded open with the shreek of metal, not waiting till it was fully open, she dropped to a crouch and rolled under, already scanning for targets.

The First thing she saw was Pvt Zhu, Unconscious, being dragged into a ceiling vent. It was too high for her to jump to but if she hurried she could grab Zhu's legs before they were dragged up completely. She was about to sprint for Lei when she heard a sudden groan to her left.

Slouched in the corner was Pvt Martinez, she was deeply moaning in pain. Her hands clutched her flat stomach.

Time slowed down.

"What Should I Do?"
12412.title: Rachel gets a call from Martinez, she needs bac...

choices: They track the Aliens to their nest...
Martinez doesn't get far before her body starts to change...
124122.content:
Rachel's attention was diverted by Pvt Martinez's moans of pain, and when she looked back at the vent, Lei was gone. "Dammit!" She thought, cursing herself for not acting faster. Wasting no more time, she rushed over to where Olivia was leaning against the cold, metallic wall.

"Urghhhhh!" Martinez let out a loud, pained grunt as she clutched her abdomen.

"What's wrong?" Rachel asked as she rushed over.

"Those things...they took the others..." Martinez panted. "They came out of nowhere. I tried to hold them off but one of them grabbed me and some sort of...appendage...came out of it's mouth."

Rachel gulped nervously, remembering what had become of Kim. "And...then what?" She asked.

"It forced something into my mouth," Martinez said, disgust filling her voice. "I don't know what it was, but I feel like I'm about to throw up."

Rachel was rarely the smartest person in the room, but she immediately knew what was going on here. The creatures that had impregnated Kim and the rest of the staff were the same creatures who had attacked her team. From the sounds of it, the strange 'appendage' that Olivia had mentioned had impregnated her as well. Rachel was horrified, and wondered if the fate would befall the rest of the squad.

"They took Felicia and Lei," Martinez said, supporting her back against the wall while she clutched at her stomach. "Did you find anything that might help us?"

Rachel wasn't sure she wanted to tell Martinez about Kim and her monstrously pregnant stomach and milk filled breasts, it would only cause her to panic, and right now, they needed to stay calm. Discovering that she had been inseminated by a group of alien monsters wasn't going to help Martinez stay focused. Hopefully they would find a way out of this situation before Martinez starting swelling up...although Rachel had no idea how. "Nothing of interest..." she replied at last. "Should we go after the others?"

Martinez steadied herself, looking dizzy as she pushed away from the wall and struggled to regain her balance. "They can't have gotten far, and this time, I'll be ready for those...things. Can you get a trace on them?"

Rachel activated her tracker again, and saw that the two pulsing lights that represented Felicia and Lei were still present. They were alive...but around them were a dozen other lights, flickering wildly. "They're being dragged somewhere beneath us," Rachel said.

"And by the looks of it, those monsters have got them well guarded," Martinez replied, glaring down at the tracker. "Come on, we're going after them."

The two women hurried out of the room, Martinez moving a little awkwardly due to her growing nausea...
124122.title: Search and Rescue

choices: Rachel and Olivia attempt a rescue...
One of the hugely pregnant women begins to give birth...
1241221.content:
Rachel held the tracker in one hand and her weapon in the other as she lead the way down the cold, dark corridor. The lights were still bleeping on the scanner, which meant that Felicia and Lei were still alive, for the moment...

"Meyers, slow down, you're moving too fast!" Martinez snapped.

Rachel turned to face her comrade, who looked a little worse for wear. She looked terrible; her face was a ghostly white colour, in contrast to her usually healthy looking tan. "Woah, Olivia, you look awful. Maybe you should rest for a minute?"

"I'm fine," Martinez replied, wiping sweat from her forehead. "Let's just keep moving."

Rachel moved ahead at a deliberately slower pace, her eyes fixed on the tracker while Olivia watched her back. Olivia didn't look good at all, and her usually graceful, athletic movements had become sluggish. Once again, she considered telling Martinez about Kim and the fate that might await them - but she couldn't even be sure that the Latino marine had been impregnated, so she decided to stay quiet until the signs became more apparent. Martinez was still standing, and that was good enough for now.

The two girls finally reached a dead end; a huge metal door that was covered in burn marks. It looked to have been sealed shut some time ago, which meant this was a dead end. There was no way they were getting past that. "Crap, we're stuck!" Rachel exclaimed, banging her fist angrily on the door.

"I don't think so..." Martinez said, propping herself up against the wall as she gestured to a vent overhead.

"Up there?" Rachel asked, confused.

"They travel through the vents, why shouldn't we?" Martinez replied.

"If we can fit," Rachel said, looking at the narrow vent above her.

"If Felicia and Lei could fit, we could too...or have you been putting on a little weight recently?" Olivia smirked.

Rachel, who was incredibly proud of her trim figure, shot a glare at Olivia. "What did you say?!"

"Oh, nothing..."

Rachel gave an annoyed grunt and punched at the vent covering with the end of her pistol. It wasn't hard to get it loose, and it soon clattered down onto the floor. Rachel put her hands in the vent and hoisted herself up, quickly moving into a crouching position on her hands and knees. It was a tight fit, but she had more breathing room than she expected.

"Rach, gimme a hand!" Martinez called from down below.

Rachel peered down at the Private, who seemed to be having some difficulty jumping up. She extended her hand, which Martinez quickly grabbed, groaning audibly as Rachel pulled her in. Martinez was panting heavily, and looked like she was about to throw up, but she seemed determined to go on. "Come on, they can't be much further," she said.

Shuffling along the vent, the cold metal rumbling underneath them, the two marines continued to follow the tracker's signal. Rachel could see the dots that represented Felicia and Lei getting larger, which indicated they were getting very close now. She hadn't really been afraid before, but she realized that she would soon come face to face with the monsters who had overrun this entire base...

"How much longer?" Martinez asked, her voice strained.

"I think we're her..." Rachel said.

Below Rachel was another vent, which she peered through. What she saw in the room below her was like a nightmare; the walls of the room were covered in some sort of strange gooey substance, and suspended within that substance was a dozen heavily pregnant women. Their stomachs were so heavily bloated and distended that they were almost touching the floor. Tattered remains of clothing and underwear lay on the floor in pools of what appeared to be milk, and every woman had such massively engorged breasts that they were still leaking even as they slept. As she scanned the bulbous, naked women, she finally caught sight of Felicia and Lei!

Unlike the other women, the two marines were still fully clothed and appeared to be conscious. Their arms and legs were trapped within the thick, disgusting goo that bound the other women, but they were struggling against it desperately. There was no sign of the aliens that had taken them though...so perhaps this would be a perfect time for a rescue?
1241221.title: The Nest

choices: Find another way to save them.
12412212.content:
As Rachel looks around, checking to make sure there was no aliens.She heard one of the impregnated women screaming.All the other victims were now awake and looking at the screaming women.Her belly was moving and a green liquid oozed out between her legs.Mother of god, Rachel thought.Martinez was behind her and although she couldn't see what was happening she can tell from the screams something was terribly wrong.Rachel was still watching helplessly as the women screamed in pain.Soon something emerged from between her legs.It was an alien like the creature which impregnated took Felicia and and Lei.There were five in total which the women gave birth.The women was now unconscious and something was happening.The creatures were climbing the unconscious victim and started eating her!

After a short ten minutes only scraps of clothes were left and the "babies" were now the size of a human and they scampered into a hole in the far end of the room.The other heavily pregnant victims all struggled but were too weak to break the glue-like substance.Lei and Felicia were also struggling but it looks like only a knife can cut it loose.The other victims were the scientists and marines station here before the aliens attacked.Their bellies now moved about and more "milk" leaked out of their humongous breast.

Rachel decides to...
12412212.title: It begins...

choices: Run and look for the others.
1241222.content:
After half an hour, Martinez was taking slow, labored steps. Rachel looked at Martinez. She felt guilty inside.

"Nggh." Martinez moaned.

"Martinez? Did you say something?" Rachel asked, pretending she didn't know what was happening to her friend.

"Rachel? I feel like crap and my abdomen is really warm." Martinez said.

"Perhaps you should sit down?" suggested Rachel.

"No! We've got to keep going after them! Also, i know its not the right time Rachel, but do you think my breasts are swelling up?" Martinez asked.

Rachel stayed quiet.

"Rachel? Is there something your...uggh...not telling me?" Martinez asked, groaning midway through.

Rachel saw Martinez's breasts swell a little and saw her belly shift under her uniform.

"Rachel?" Martinez asked once more.

Rachel decided to explain to Martinez what will happen to her.

After 10 minutes of explaining, Martinez slumped to the ground shocked, she stared at her slight bump and rubbed her stomach. She then handed Rachel her pistol and ammo.

"Here." Martinez said, giving Rachel her sidearm and ammo. "Even if i don't get out of here, take a few of those bastards out, for me?"

"I am not leaving you here." declared Rachel.

"Ugghhh! arghh! ngghh! You've no choice! Look...nggh...at me!" Groaned Martinez, lifting up her shirt to emphasize her now bulging belly.

"I look like I'm...uggh...carrying triplets here...ngghh...and I know for a fact, whatever is coming out of me, its not human, and its not friendly". She Stated Matter-of Factly.

A Tear ran down Rachel's Cheek as she took Martinez's offered ammo and sidearm .Martinez, now semi naked, lay there with her swollen breasts exposed and leaking milk. Her orb of belly just nudging through the shirt she was wearing..

"Go Rachel..... nggh.....go before these damn thing claw their way out of me!" Martinez Cried.

Rachel chose to...
1241222.title: Martinez doesn't get far before her body st...

12412221.content:
"Alright Martinez, I'll go and get help, but I promise I'll be back for you!" Rachel vowed to her incapacitated comrade.

"...Just pay em back for what they've done here Rach." Martinez said, before groaning in pain. Rachel then looked around and saw the vents that Lei Zhu had gotten dragged into.

"Don't worry Zhu, I'm not gonna let them get you too! I swear it!" Rachel said determined not to let another of her comrades get impregnated by these monsters. She then climbed up into the vent that Lei Zhu had disappeared into. She then crawled around for a couple minutes before hearing a scream. "Lei Zhu!" Rachel whispered anxiously as she tried to find the source of her comrade's voice. Then, she came to an open part of the vent where it sounded like the voice was coming from, as she cocked her pistol, she peered down and saw Lei Zhu cornered by one of the aliens. Now that it was out in the open she could see it clearly. "Reminds of the Alien movies with those chestbursters and crap." She whispered.

As she dropped down silently she managed to get at an angle behind a large pipe, and she could see a tentacle coming out of the aliens mouth. "No way! I'm not letting you freaks take another one of us!" She yelled inside her mind as she aimed her pistol at the tentacle. Now Rachel may not have been the smartest of the group, but what she lacked in brains she made up for having near perfect accuracy with almost anything she could throw or shoot. So aiming at the tentacle was easily doable for her, and she fired, blowing the tentacle off just as it reached Lei Zhu. "Yeah go to hell freak!" She yelled out as Lei Zhu sighed in relief at the sight of her savior. The alien on the other hand was enraged, and turned to face Rachel. However, as it charged at Rachel she simply put it down with a couple rounds to it's head.

"Oh Rachel thank God you're here, everyone is gone! They took them!" Lei Zhu sobbed as she recalled the events that had transpired earlier.

"I know Zhu, but Martinez seems to be alright for the moment, but unfortunately seems to have been impregnated by those things..." Rachel said sadly, "but don't you worry we'll get out of this!" She said reassuringly to her companion. She then gave Lei Zhu Martinez's side arm. A colt .357 magnum. "Let's pay em back!" Rachel said. However just as they were about to leave they heard a noise from right behind them. They quickly turned around and found face to face...
12412221.title: Run and look for the others.

124122211.content:
"Uh R-R-Rachel..." Lei Zhu said, pointing behind Rachel and looking terrified.

"What is i-aw crap!" Rachel said as she looked behind her, seeing two aliens who had just heard the previous fight. For a couple seconds, nobody moved, and it was so silent that one could hear a pin drop. However, Rachel then brought up her pistol as fast as she could in an attempt to fire at the aliens. However, the creatures knew just what her weapon was capable of, and swatted the gun out of her hands and also knocking her over.

"Rachel no!" Lei Zhu screamed as she fired her revolver at the aliens in a desperate attempt to fight back. However, her aim was not as good as Rachel's and only ended up grazing the Alien that had charged at her. The creature swiftly knocked and pinned her down. "Rachel help!" Lei Zhu yelled out, fearing for her life. However, Rachel had also been pinned down by the other alien and was struggling to get away.

"Argh! Let go of me you son of a bi-" Rachel tried to yell, but was still in the iron grip of her captor. As Rachel looked over to Lei Zhu she saw the Asian private had been knocked out, and the alien who was over her had begun extending the same tentacle towards her that the alien she killed had had out before. "No, Lei Zhu!" She whispered in defeat. As she shifted her eyes back towards her captor, the last thing she saw before blacking out, was another tentacle headed right for her.

(30 minutes later)

Rachel groaned as she came to. She felt fine for the most part, if not a bit nauseous. As she looked around she noticed that she was in the same room as before, but the aliens had disappeared. She was about to ponder about the matter when her eyes widened. "Lei Zhu!" She thought frantically looking around, before sighing in relief when she spotted her comrade lying on the ground a few feet away. "Hm...for the most part we both seem ok...I mean...neither of us look pregnant." She thought, trying to reassure herself. She then lightly slapped Lei Zhu's face in an attempt to wake up. "C'mon Zhu get up!" She said anxiously. Finally Lei Zhu opened her eyes slowly, but had a scared look.

"Rachel what happened to those things? Are they gone?" She asked in fear.

"Yeah they left." Rachel replied quietly.

"...Are we...you know..." Lei Zhu asked with a mixture of sadness and worry.

"I don't know, but we can't say for sure, but for now let's find a way out of here." Rachel said, trying to take their minds off of what just happened. As they got up to find a way out...
124122211.title: Two Aliens!

starting running and hope she finds the others, making it out of the cargo hold she heard a loud *POP* and the end of Kim's screaming. not stopping the only thing on her mind was guilt for not helping her, but that was quickly crushed as not even a minute after, she then started to hear scratching on the floor...CHASING HER!!!.

"OH SHIT!!" looking back to only see darkness she kept running full tilt trying to get away, making a quick turn she saw a lite room ahead of her. she mentally screamed with joy as she closed, but that joy was short lived because as soon as she passed the door she triped. face planting into the ground causing her to be dazed and however long it lasted, what was following finally got close.

something grabs her legs as she finally regained her focus, "NO,NO,NO,NO GET OFF!!" kicking wildly hoping they hit the target *SCREEE* a hiss of pain assures of her that "HA!". her moment of victory didn't last long as even more limbs grab at her, tarring her clothes leaving only her harness for her pistol and radio, she blushed from embarrassment but she kept trying to get free.

now nude and laying on the cold floor as aliens try to drag her away, her attempts only got one arm free from the aliens confines. reaching for anything that could help she grab her flash light and tried to hit it, but it only hit a few time turning on and off showing the horrors that are Kim's brood. she only got to see at least 3 small alien insect like creatures, as they held her down. one of which began to reach down to her bear rear, shifting itself as readied for what it really intended.

"AHHHHH" screaming as they began to force their way into her, her belly expanding as the first one enters her womb. after which she promptly passed out from the shire panic and shock to her body and mind.


*time skip*

when Rachel came too....
124131.title: Run and look for the others.

choices: Rachel gets knocked out and impregnated.
124132.content: Rachel tries to help Kim, but before she could she hears a 'think' behind her. She turns around to she 3 massive insect-like aliens behind her. Rachel stares wide-eyed but moves her gun towards the aliens. The largest Alien knocks the gun away and grabs Rachel's neck pulling her up 4 feet from the ground. The Alien then restrains her, the other two grab Kim and start pulling her towards an open door. Kim screams in pain but manages to get out a sentence before she disappears, "Unngh....Rachel....please....help...". Kim disappears from sight. This leaves Rachel with the Alien. Rachel pleads with the Alien while it sticks its appendage out of its mouth, "Please.... don't!"
124132.title: Try and help Kim.

1242.content:
Slowly the lights came back on.Turns out that was the backup generator,looks like Martinez and Zhu succeeded.Turning off her torch she continued to go deeper into research center.

"Uggh why did I chose to be a marine again?"Rachel thought to herself.

The lights were not so bright but they allowed Rachel to see without her torch.Although the power was back on there was still some lights that were smashed and some were flickering.

"Weird...seems like someone or something smashed the lights..."Rachel thought to herself.

"Any luck on your end guys?"Rachel talked through the radio.

No answer was made.

"I repeat any luck on your end guys?"Rachel repeated.

Still no answer.Worried she decided to get back to the hatch area.

While heading back she found...
1242.title: The noise was the power coming back on...

12421.content:
“Wait, don’t shoot!” A bent over woman cries out, holding her hand forward.

“Are you alright, ma’am?” Rachel nearly drops her pistol from the shock.

“Please… help me…”

Rachel can see what is wrong with the woman, her belly is swollen immensely.

“What happened to you?!” Rachel asks as she drops her pistol for real.

“I’m pregnant… but… the baby… isn’t human…” The woman parts her labcoat to reveal something moving within her belly. “Aliens invaded the station… all the men are dead, and all the women… well… pregnant…”

Rachel stares at the swollen dome of flesh as she sees something within push against the walls that enclose it.

“Are you… gonna be okay?” Rachel asks in concern.

“I… I don’t know… I doubt it… while most births I’ve seen have been vaginal… they got eaten after giving birth…” The scientist speaks out of breath.

“Wait… what do you mean most?”

“The queen… I forget who it was exactly, but whoever got pregnant with the queen that nested here, she… she burst… please… I beg of you… if this isn’t a queen… don’t let it eat me! Please, help me!” The scientist begs with tears welling in her eyes.

Rachel puts her hands on her hips, trying to figure out what to do about the situation.
12421.title: A heavily pregnant scientist

choices: Rachel decides to take Karen into the room
124212.content:
“Look, I know you’re heavily pregnant right now, but it isn’t safe here, we gotta move.” Rachel says as she moves to help the scientist back to her feet.

“O-Okay… thank you…” The scientist places one hand on her belly instinctively, the other on Rachel’s shoulder as she stands up.

“Corporal, I’m bringing back a scientist, she’s probably capable of explaining more of what happened here.” Rachel speaks into her radio, only to hear static in response. “Grr…”

“Hoo… hoo…” The scientist breathes.

“You’re not popping, are you?” Rachel asks.

“Ooh… please don’t say ‘pop…’ and no, I’m not going into labor…” She grunts.

“What is it, then?” Rachel puts her pistol back into its holster.

“Well, carrying around a big belly full of alien life isn’t the easiest thing in the world…” The scientist complains as a thrust at her navel forces her to gasp.

“You said you weren’t gonna blow!” Rachel quickly redraws her pistol.

“Trust me, I’m not! When the poor woman gave birth to the queen, the start of labor was much more violent… I’m fine… I hope… please, tell me, what’s your name?” The scientist asks Rachel.

“Private Meyers… but… just for comfort’s sake… call me Rachel.” Rachel stops walking to face the scientist.

“Mine’s Karen…” The scientist smiles, before something catches her eye. “There… there’s a room with supplies that could probably tell us what’s in me…” She suggests.

Listening to Karen’s suggestion, Rachel...
124212.title: The scientist follows Rachel

choices: There's no time for explanations, they have to move!
1242121.content:
Rachel jumps as Karen suddenly screams. Turning around to face what Karen screamed at, Rachel gasps as she finds a large alien humanoid figure standing in front of her.

“G-Get back!” Rachel shouts as she fumbles her pistol, the alien quickly jumping into Rachel, pinning her to the ground.

The creature looks up at Karen, quickly sniffing her belly, before turning its attention back to Rachel.

“Oh no… Rachel, you gotta get it off of you!” Karen screams as Rachel struggles with the alien.

Having had enough of her struggling, the alien claws at Rachel’s armor, sports bra being the only surviving article.

Rachel suddenly falls still as she witnesses an appendage slither out of the creature's mouth, before screaming as it stabs into her navel, clenching her eyes shut as she feels the alien pump something into her body.

As quickly as it had appeared, the alien suddenly jumps off of Rachel, disappearing into darkness.

“Oh no… Rachel… you… you don’t have much time!” Karen quickly waddles over to Rachel.

“W-What do you mean by that?!” Rachel’s eyes widen by Karen’s words.

“Rachel, I think it impregnated you with a queen!”
1242121.title: Rachel encounters an alien

choices: She attempts to regroup with the others
12421211.content:
“H-How do you know?” Rachel asks Karen in a panic.

“We… were conducting research in this facility on the species that has taken it over… it was just discovered. A female scientist was voluntarily impregnated with one of them, and everything seemed fine for a while. The pregnancy was the hot discussion around the facility, and she was loving all the attention she was getting. She always had her belly on full display, open for any colleague to rub it.” Karen rubs her own belly defensively.

“But how do you know I was impregnated with a queen?” Rachel asks as she breaks into a sweat.

“She was impregnated in the same fashion. However, when the rest of us were impregnated, while it was the exact same method for all of us, it was different than when she was impregnated with the current queen… judging by how fast they reproduce, their lifespans must be awfully short… if they’re already breeding a new queen… this could be fantastic news, if it wasn’t costing lives…” Karen continues to rub her belly.

“So, I still have time, right?! How did the pregnancy go?” Rachel frantically pats her currently flat stomach down.

“Well… it lasted for a week…”

“Damn it, we’re not gonna be able to reach a medical station in time with our transport!” Rachel punches the ground.

“If you can radio out, you should be able to bring surgeons here in a faster transport to surgically remove the queen… but, there’s one problem…” Karen raises her finger to symbolize her raising her point.

“The aliens…” Rachel speaks through gritted teeth.

“Unless you can flush these aliens out, you’re going to have to rely on whatever medical supplies your squad has to keep you alive after the birth… we don’t have anyone that will be able to perform the surgery, so you guys have no choice but to overpower the aliens.”

“Okay… but… I need details on the pregnancy, I doubt I’ll have much time to fight before I’m too big to do anything.”

“She… did all her growing in hours…” Karen says meekly.

“...What?” Rachel can feel anger building inside her.

“She didn’t get too big, maybe she looked like she was due with twins? She was only slightly bigger than I am. But, she did all of her growing in just hours. If you don’t do something fast, you’re going to have to fight with a belly, or lose entirely.”

With minimal options, Rachel decides to...
12421211.title: Karen explains what happened

124212111.title: She attempts to regroup with the others

choices: She has to do the fighting herself
Get the door open for back up
124212112.content:
Rachel brings her radio up to her face, “This is Private Rachel Meyers, does any copy?”

She runs a hand along her stomach as she anticipates an answer, before finally hearing, “Private Meyers, what happened?!” She hears her sergeant over the radio.

“Sergeant! I… I got impregnated… with their new queen… I was informed I only have a week to live, unless we can surgically remove it before I explode.” Rachel frantically tries to not drop her radio in a panic.

“...We should be able to get doctors out here before then, but…”

“The aliens, yes. We have to flush them out now for the surgeons to have access to the facilities, or I can just take a chance and hope what medical supplies will keep me alive after the birth.” Rachel stumbles toward her pistol, slowly picking it up off of the ground.

“How do you know it’s a queen?”

“...I learned from a scientist that they impregnate those with queens through their navels, while everyone else gets impregnated orally. Those who get it orally survive birth, but so far, they’ve all been eaten by what they gave birth to. Be careful, sergeant.” Rachel motions to put her radio away, but her sergeant speaks.

“Private, we should regroup, now.”

“No time, Sergeant. There are probably tons of aliens between us anyway, shoot anything that stands higher than five foot seven, or get knocked up.” Rachel turns off her radio, turning the safety off of her pistol.

An alien bursts through the ceiling, though this time, Rachel immediately opened fire, the creature dead before it touched the ground.

She puts a hand to her stomach, feeling it slowly swell under her fingers, “Grr… running out of time!”

“Rachel, maybe you should fall back, and let your comrades do the fighting?”

Rachel decides...
124212112.title: She takes immediate action

1242122.content:
Rachel followed Karen into the room, which turn out to be a medical lab meant for treatment of staff and testing of new research advances. passing through the door, Rachel noticed that the room was in a mess from tossed books to broken glass on the floor. what made it even worse was the trial of blood leading out of the door they came through, "lets make sure to close the doors and check out the rest of the room" Karen nodded with immediate agreement.

closing the door behind them, she turned to watch Karen waddle to a nearby medical bed and sat down. her belly was moving with slow but constant bumps. "everything ok?" Rachel asks, "yeah, the thing is just moving thats all" she looks around the room until finding a machine in the corner. "can you bring that over, it's the ultrasound machine I need" she points at it, nodding and moving over to the machine. As she does Rachel notices varies types of devices and notes on the counters to it right.

when she was close to it, she grabs and pulled it over to Karen. who stood and began to flip switches, soon the machine buzzed to life with a smooth Hum. Rachel moved in front of the machine with it being in-between them, Karen places her hand on the screen. this causes it to hum loader, "what happening isn't this just a ultrasound?”.

Karen tricked Rachel, to save her own hide!!!

Its is a ultrasound, its just very complicated
1242122.title: Rachel decides to take Karen into the room

choices: Retreive the supplies from the transport.
12423.content:
"Damn where are they!?!" Rachel thought to herself.

She then noticed a figure slumped against the bulkhead, looking closer she saw who it was. "Felicia!" She shouted. She sprinted towards her. She stopped short as she saw her comrade.

"Hellpp..."Felicia groaned weakly.

"Oh my god! Felicia! What happened!" Rachel cried.

Felicia lay on the floor with her huge breasts resting on her now seriously swelling belly. Her uniform had been unbuttoned and yet her belly seemed to be trying to rip it apart, the fabric seemed to groan under the pressure..

"Aliens...uggh...get...uggh...ngggh...help..."Felicia spoke in between moans of pain.

"Aliens?! The others! Are they also..."Rachel asked, holding back tears.

"Hggh...others are somewhere, nggh ugghh...I can't hold it! ...arrrggghh I need hellppp" begged Felicia.

Rachel nodded.

"Whats inside of you...?"Rachel asks.

"I "uggh" don't know...! "Felicia said.

"Its...,arggh! ......painful. Help...me...please!" Felicia begged.

"We need medical supplies..."Rachel stated.

"The transport! uggh there are some supplies...hurry!"Felicia says.

Rachel nodded again.
12423.title: Her comrade

choices: Take the closed door on the left.
Maybe there's a survivor, she chooses the hallway.
Pick the closed door on the right; it's the right side, right?
13.content:
For a brief moment, Isabelle felt panic surge in her chest; if she chose wrong, lives could be lost.

She knew what needed to be done, she just didn't want to be the one to make the call. She took a deep breath, cleared her head, and pressed the button.

"Consult Dr. Daringer." The radio crackled with an affirmation from the young private running the radio back on the transport before it fell into silence.

She gazed out into the red desert, observing an enormous dirt devil twirling and dancing in the distant wind, while she waited for the scientist to give her the proper coordinates to place explosives. In most other situations, Isabelle would have found the dirt devil beautiful, but now it was just an obnoxious creation that made her entrance into the satellite compound that much more difficult.

The minutes ticked away into eternity and she was beginning to think clearing the front door might have been as fast when her radio crackled back to life.

"Sgt Contreras, this is Dr. Daringer. I have the coordinates but listen closely, if you're even slightly off. . . I cannot stress to you how important it is that your team places the explosives exactly where I tell you." She rolled her eyes, as if she needed reminding, but listened intently to his instructions.

When she was done, she called over Cpl. Dawson. The young woman was somewhat of an enigma among her peers. While most of the bomb crew were male and had extensive training under their belts, she proved to be superior despite her gender and lack of training. Somehow, instinctively, she knew what to do every time. The jokes around the barracks was that her luck would eventually get the pretty blonde blown up.

After receiving her orders, she hoisted her pack on her shoulders and ran over to the big dish with two of her fellow Marines hot on her trails. Their boots left prints in the sand for only a few minutes before the wind kicked up and swept them clear.

Such a desolate hell, what could be here that would draw the attention of the government?

After about a half hour, Dawson came running back, her big, blue eyes twinkling with delight. The two lance corporals with her followed close behind, looking like little boys who just got a new toy. Isabelle felt her own excitement and fear swell up. Explosions were always fun, just so long as they didn't do any harm with it.

Once the area was cleared of any of their people, Contreras nodded her head and the perky bomber pushed the button. A small fountain of red flew up and the noise roared louder than the constant wind, but Dawson did her job well. It was tiny and controlled, and hopefully placed perfect.

Isabelle took the lead, ordering her Marines to fall behind her and they ran over to the top of the compound. Using proper procedure, she secured a repelling rope to the satellite and let the end dangle into the hole.

She shined her flashlight into the darkness and gave a sigh of relief. Asides from the pile of rubble on the floor, there were no other apparent signs of the explosion. Dr. Daringer theorized they would be dropping into the entry hall and as far as she could tell, the man was dead on with his calculations.

Never one to back down from a challenge, she insisted on being the first lowered down into the room.

At ground level, the entry hall took on a whole new appearance to her. Her flashlight made dust motes dance in the air, thick as snow from the explosion, but still lit up the room.

It didn't look good.

There was a long hallway directly in front of her that lead off into inky blackness and two closed doorways on either side of the hallway. Right next to the hallway, blood splattered on the floor and smeared against the wall, trailing into the darkness.

As the rest of squad landed on the rubble strewn floor, Isabelle knew she had a decision to make. Which way would she choose to explore?
13.title: Blow a hole in the roof with the transport.

132.title: Maybe there's a survivor, she chooses the h...

info.brief_description: A Space Marine Team sent to investigate a Research Station.
info.description:
Before we start. There are some rules to this story.

No MPreg
No Forced Choices
No Killing Off The Main Character
Keep the story from the viewpoint of the Main Character at all times.
Chapters can be as long as you like. No going on wild tangents though.
Think of the Aliens like the ones from Alien. But instead of chestbursters. They just impregnate with a baby.

Thats about it. So Just Write and have fun.

(If i edit your story, please do not take offence. It will just be minor edits to improve punctuation and the like. Thank you and Msg me if you have any concerns, Yours Sincerely: Pregstories) 04/09/2012
